body:
I noticed that there is a huge regression on node bootup since Wednesday last couple of days:

Bad one:


Please note that the issue is not related to any kubernetes component. The node hasn't run salt client yet. This explains a lot of node not ready issue we have lately.  #18969

cc/ @zmerlynn #21086

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: Investigate long bootup time of containervm instance
